title: Ionic App Development Platform on Debian 8 VMware Image
description:
This file contains a complete and simple development platform for Ionic/Angular Android Apps. All you need to install on your PC is a free VMware Player for your operation system, available for Windows, Linux and MAC!

The image file contains Debian 8 64 bit with Gnome minimal, VM Tools, Firefox, Chrome, the real Oracle Java JRE and Android SDK, Node server with NPM, Angular, Ionic and Bower, Sublime Text Editor and much more... no hassle with installing on Linux ;)

With some additionally tools already installed, also a classic Windows user should be able to handle this.

KNOWN RESTRICTIONS: the Android emulator does not run in the virtual environment (yet?). You still can use your smart phone or the browser preview for testing.


What's the story behind?
I got sick of all these different installations for various projects and online courses, messing with each other and my system. Now for each new project I just clone a new VM and everything is running smoothly :)

Installation:
After you installed the VMware Player (or Workstation), extract the tar.gz file and open the vmdk file in it. Check the settings (CPU, RAM) according to you your PC. 
Start the VM. Password (also for root) is: changeme

Have fun and SEED!


Please contact me for bugs, requests and so on
